snippet.title: Dark Trip - Psychedelic Escape Room Story Trailer (VR Game)
snippet.description:
Grab Early Access on Meta Store: https://vr.meta.me/s/1MnwAXOoZv44zC3

Psychedelic escape room where a detective eats pills to solve puzzles and relies on own hallucinations to investigate an eerie crime case 

Enter the surreal horror! 

Welcome to one of the most unique and bizarre VR experiences, where you take on the role of an investigator searching for a missing woman — and are forced to consume drugs during your mission. The boundaries between reality, virtuality, and hallucinations dissolve, immersing you in a Lovecraftian nightmare when in a small German town, the only daughter of a retired businessman vanishes without a trace. Hired to investigate the case, the player discovers a seemingly abandoned laboratory. As you explore room after room, you uncover evidence of twisted experiments, scattered notebooks of employees, and disturbing accounts from test subjects. The gameplay revolves around solving intricate puzzles while piecing together the unsettling truth of the past. 

Experience mind-bending psychedelic trips that distort perception and twist your surroundings!

- Solve Puzzles in an Eerie Environment. Dive into a haunting world filled with grotesque biotechnological machinery and the wicked remnants of dark experiments.
- Experiences Psychedelic Trips. Immerse yourself into mind-bending psychedelic trips that distort perception and twist your surroundings. 
- Use Hallucinations to Find Missing Evidence. Search for clues, artifacts and diary pieces to discover the dark story behind the gruesome events.

Plot

In a small German town, the only daughter of a retired businessman disappears. A player hired to investigate the case finds a seemingly abandoned laboratory. Exploring room after room, the player discovers evidence of experiments carried out in the place, notebooks left behind by both employees and test subjects.

It becomes clear that the infamous Nazi doctor Mengele conducted his inhuman experiments here using psychedelic substances and sadomasochistic practices. Moving deeper, the hero understands that despite the apparent abandonment, the laboratory is still active and the experiment continues: Olga (the kidnapped girl) and the player themself are in fact the active subjects of the evil occult ritual that is merging the infernal plane with our world causing bizarre sets where one can not distinguish hallucinations from reality…

Early Access

The goals of Early Access are to refine and enhance Dark Trip’s unique mechanics — which dynamically alter gameplay and puzzle elements based on the protagonist’s mental state — and to expand the game’s content through continuous feedback from our community.
